graph_title: 3.7.1. Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15-49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods of contraception

indicator_name: Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15–49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods

ro.indicator_available: Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15-49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods of contraception
ro.indicator_name: Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15–49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods
ro.SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 3.7.1: Ponderea femeilor de vârstă fertilă (15-49 ani) cu necesități de planificare a familiei satisfăcute prin metode moderne de contracepție
ro.SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 3.7: Până în 2030, asigurarea accesului universal la serviciile de sănătate sexuală și reproductivă, inclusiv pentru planificarea familiei, informare și educație, precum și integrarea sănătății reproducerii în strategiile și programele naționale
ro.GOAL_META_LINK_TEXT: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 865kB)
ro.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 3.7.1: Ponderea femeilor de vârstă fertilă (15-49 ani) cu necesități de planificare a familiei satisfăcute prin metode moderne de contracepție
ro.DATA_SOURCE:
1) Agenția Națională pentru Sănătate Publică

2) UNICEF
ro.DATA_COMP: Numărul femeilor de vârstă fertilă (15-49 ani) care nu doresc să abă (mai  mulți) copii, ori doresc să amâne nașterea unui copil următor prin utilizare  mijloacelor moderne de contracepție raportat la numărul total al femeilor de  vârsta respectivă *100.
ro.source_organisation_1:
1) Agenția Națională pentru Sănătate Publică

2) Ministerul Muncii și Protecției Sociale

SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 3.7.1: Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15-49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 3.7: By 2030, ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health-care services, including for family planning, information and education, and the integration of reproductive health into national strategies and programmes
GOAL_META_LINK_TEXT: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 865kB)
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 3.7.1: Proportion of women of reproductive age (aged 15-49 years) who have their need for family planning satisfied with modern methods of contraception
DATA_SOURCE:
1.National Agency for Public Health

2.United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF)
DATA_COMP: Number of women of reproductive age (15-49 years old) who do not wish to have  (more) children or who wish to postpone the birth of the following child by  use of modern methods of contraception out of the total number of women of the  respective age *100.
source_organisation_1:
1.National Agency for Public Health

2.Ministry of Labour and Social Protection
